Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Is this some kind of a joke?!'}
{3: 'A loud noise comes out of the laboratory, something other than an explosion, for once. It startles Ayla, who is returning to get more couplets.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "W-what's happening?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla carefully opens the door and finds quite a few people inside. Aside from Asimov and Allen, Presiden Hassen and Commander Nikola are also present.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Chairman! And why is Commander Nikola here as well...', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: "How do I put it... I messed up. Commander Nikola was there when I handed in the application to President Hassen, and he immediately came this way after knowing what we've been up to.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "We're so done...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola takes a deep breath, trying to contain his anger.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Wasting the precious resources from the Science Council to make these ridiculous things... Why would any of you think that we'll allow it?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: "Speaking for the WGAA, hosting activities to promote human civilization and culture is what we do. I don't see what's wrong with it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola shakes his head, disappointed as if he has wasted his time.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You're on the Council, you should've known your priorities. This isn't time for festivities.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Allen', 3: "I don't think it's an either-or situation.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Alright. I'm sure that Asimov has his considerations when he accepts this job on behalf of the Science Council.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Facing Hassen's questions, Asimov nods as he continues deciphering the couplets on the floor."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Commander Nikola, do you remember approving the CUB project at the Council a while ago?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Of course! So why are you abandoning that project to do arts and crafts with the WGAA?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'These couplets are written by the AI system of the CUB used in previous tests...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Huh, isn't that interesting, Nikola?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola does not appear to find it interesting.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Therefore, the Science Council has deemed it necessary to analyze and restore these couplets to better calibrate the AI system.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: 'Just so happens, we also want to deliver the couplets to different squads and departments to lift their spirits during Lunar New Year.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Even so, I still don't agree to waste our time on this matter.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As the tension mounts, a smiling young man walks out from a corner to Nikola's side."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Commander, I have a question for Asimov, if you don't mind?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite looking impatient, Nikola signals Murray to ask his question with a look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Although I don't know how this... CUB works, but from what I understand, many Construct squads are not willing to use them currently.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "You're right. Celica did a survey earlier, and many Constructs were worried about the stability of their M.I.N.D.s when connecting directly to its AI system...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Catching Murray's intent, Ayla quickly follows."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Therefore, if there's a function that let people understand the CUBs more, it'll make the squad members trust them more.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola picks up one of the couplets and takes a look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "...With this? Nevermind. You'll assess how useful this activity is—but only on the basis that other R&D projects and missions won't be affected.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Right, in that case, let's also put these couplets up outside the Council and the Commander's room.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Are you serious...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Haha, why not? If we set an example to embrace new things, I'm certain the other squads will follow suit.", 4: '2'}
{3: "With Nikola's tacit approval, Ayla immediately takes out the couplets she prepared with a grin."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Leave the decorating to WGAA! We're efficient, and it won't interrupt your work at all!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...You better be.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With their approval, Ayla leaves the room as quickly as she can, as if staying for another second would risk Nikola going back on his words.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What a mess...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Let it go. It's the New Year—the young people should move around more... Now, the rest of us still have some things to take care of.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "True. We've wasted too much time here. There is still plenty to discuss and decide for next year's battle plan.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hassen and Nikola leave the laboratory first, followed by Murray, who says goodbye to Asimov and Allen with a smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'I should also go, then. Keep up with your work, gentlemen!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: 'I guess I should thank you for your help. And... Happy New Year.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Murray looks a little surprised by Allen's gratitude, but he quickly composes himself."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Of course. Happy New Year to you as well.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray gives them a slight bow before turning around and walking out of the room after Hassen and Nikola. He is smiling, albeit peculiarly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "(—Indeed, there's much to happen this year. I've got to be prepared.)", 4: '1'}
